Right now I'm using a phototransistor as the sensor. A 931-A photomultiplier tube also works as well as what I outlined two years ago in this article. http://www.aaevp.com/techniques/techniques_optical_microphone.htm  Many different configurations seem to work, it's wide open for exploration.

Dave
